pullRequest.title: Actually use the default bootnodes from NetworkDefinition
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Since the default value for --p2p-discovery-bootnodes was an empty list, it was always considered specified so we never used the bootnodes defined by the network.  Make the new default null and always have the network provide boot nodes (which may be the empty list).  We still wind up with the empty list instead of null but can differentiate between boot nodes not being specified and the user explicitly specifying no boot nodes.

commit.message: Actually use the default bootnodes from NetworkDefinition.

nodes.bodyText: This is pretty subtle / easy to break - we should probably add a test that checks the right values are set based on CLI args to  BeaconNodeCommandTest.

commit.message: Add test to confirm network definition values are actually used.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into use-default-bootnodes
